resource.chars:
we had one before.
For example
                           A - T
                           T - A
                           C - G
                           A - T
                           G - C
                           T - A
                           T - A

                          chains
                ↙        separate       ↘
             A                             T
             T                             A
             C                             G
             A                             T
             G                             C
             T                             A
             T                             A
                          ↓
                      new chains form

             A - T                        T - A
             T - A                        A - T
             C - G                        G - C
             A - T                        T - A
             G - C                        C - G
             T - A                        A - T
             T - A                        A - T
